item.description:
Hello,

I booked three Tee times for Sunday, August 12th:  2:20, 2:30 and 3:00 (the 3pm tee time was added for those on the wait list...I hope it's not too late notice)...you can walk the course (since it's after 2pm.  Walking 18 holes is $55 and 18 with cart is $68).  I'm holding these with credit card and 24 hr cancellation policy.

They have a driving range (mats only, if I remember correctly).

Butter Brook is a fun and challenging course.  It blends in some "links" style holes on the back 9.

Here's the link:  http://www.butterbrookgc.com/index

I'll be at the Pro Shop at 2:00.

See you there!

Jon

Assistant Organizer

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Butter Brook Golf Club Sunday, August 12th
